summary: Tired of daggers being nearly vertical, clipping through armor and skirts while standing, and right through your leg when sneaking?! Give this a try, maybe you'll like it!
descriptionHtml:
This is a small mod that moves the sheathed dagger to a more sword-like position, turning it out horizontally. I designed this with a Dwarven Dagger and Blades Armor in mind, but it should be good with most other armors. Clipping through legs while sneaking should be totally eliminated, and will look much nicer. Clipping with chairs is minimal, but who really cares, right?

This is a skeleton replacer, so it will totally conflict with mods like Belt-Fastened Quivers and any other mod that changes the vanilla skeleton.

Not for ladies, lizards, or cats, but I might be updating that eventually.

Thanks to Helen Lee's tutorial on editing skeletons, linked above.

!!!!FOR THOSE WITH NO CHANGES!!!!
I don't know if it's the Nexus, or if I used the wrong pathing in v2, but if you manually install it, it should work. The path is Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets
author: Arrythmia91
